item.title: Best Horror of September 2025: The Final ‘Conjuring,’ ‘Strangers’ Returns, Demonic Football Stars and More
item.description: Welcome to Horror Explorer, a curated column showcasing the month’s best movies, series, books and everything else spooky worth checking out. I’m William Earl, the executive digital director of Variet
